adrFormatAddress: 111 4th Ave, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: We could not be happier with our decision in choosing Sarah Merians Photography. We feel extremely lucky that we had both Sarah and Liel as our photographers and they were the absolute best. They made sure that we felt comfortable the entire time and once the party started we never even felt them being there (which is what we had asked for). They captured the entire evening beautifully and the pictures show the story of the entire evening from the quiet moments to the party on the dance floor. Thank you to Sarah and Liel for everything!

text.text: We could not be happier with our decision in choosing Sarah Merians Photography. We feel extremely lucky that we had both Sarah and Liel as our photographers and they were the absolute best. They captured the entire evening beautifully and the pictures show the story of the entire evening from the quiet moments to the party on the dance floor. Thank you to Sarah and Liel for everything!

originalText.text: The entire team at Sarah Merians is not only professional, but they are incredibly creative, fun, and great to work with.  Finding the right vendors for your wedding can be a daunting task, but the minute we met with the SM team, we were sold.  Their photographers, Liel and John, have such great energy and knew how to frame the best pictures.  Their excitement and enthusiasm helped to keep our bridal party of 25 fully engaged and excited throughout the day.  They led us through the streets of NYC during the holiday tourist season taking the BEST photos and creating such a memorable experience for everyone.  Everyone we've worked with, from Sarah herself, to Lisa, Angela, and Stefanie, has been so accommodating and quick to respond.  We can't thank them enough for being such a big part of our wedding.

originalText.text: I don't have anything but amazing things to say about Sarah Merians. We used Sarah Merians for both photography and videography for our wedding. From start to finish, I wholeheartedly trusted them capture the most important day of my life. Our photographer, Liel, is amazing! We used him for our engagement shoot, which gave us an opportunity to get to know him and his style before the wedding. He's professional, fun and insanely talented. Everyone raved about him! Liel and the videographer worked seamlessly together. The photo booth was well worth it - All our guests had a blast taking pictures with fun props! Everyone we worked with at Sarah Merians was responsive, knowledgable and a pleasure to work with. I'd highly recommend using them!

originalText.text: We have hired Sarah Merians Photography to photograph student graduations at Sotheby's Institute of Art - New York for years. Sarah is a pleasure to work with. She is always on top of things and makes sure we are well taken care of. The photographers are professional, courteous, and talented! We've been impressed with the photos every year and have never been disappointed. Our events are large in scale and Sarah's photographers have been friendly, calm, and they make sure we get every shot we ask for and more!

text.text: We have hired Sarah Merians Photography to photograph student graduations at Sotheby's Institute of Art - New York for years. Sarah is a pleasure to work with. We've been impressed with the photos every year and have never been disappointed. originalText.text:
Sarah was a pleasure to work with!  We booked her for our real estate team's photo shoot and we love our pictures.  She shot an incredible variety of group photos as well as headshots.

Sarah has a great personality and made everyone feel at ease and comfortable in front of the camera.  She has a creative eye and came up with some great concepts for us!  We are very happy!
